page.title: 15TRANSPORT
page.content: Local means of transport in our area are the car, bus, train, bicycle and motor cycle. The cost of a bus journey from the Crematorium to Castle Gardens is 12 pence. There are two public bus services - the Ribble and the Blackpool Corporation. The railway line in our area is the Mineral Railway which runs past Layton and Cottam Hall Playing Fields. This line has only got one stop in our area. The car is the most popular means of transport. It is easy to find a parking place for a car in our area.
